movies.title: The Video Dead
movies.plot: An unlabelled crate from an unknown source is delivered to a house in the woods. The homeowner unwisely accepts the delivery, only to discover it contains a TV set that starts spewing giggling zombies all over the place. When a new family moves into the now-abandoned house, the son discovers the haunted televsion and is soon told what he needs to do to send the zombies back where they belong. Knowing and doing, however, are two very different things, and the zombies are not likely to go quietly.
movies.simplePlot: A family takes delivery of a new television set, unaware that it is the gateway by which killer zombies enter the world.

biography.bio: Michael St. Michaels was born in Poughkeepsie, New York and was once a jet-setting hair-dresser to the world's elite who traveled to every European hot spot in the 70s. He has worked in and around Hollywood for decades. St. Michaels is best known to cinephiles for his work in the 80s cult curiosity The Video Dead. 2016's The Greasy Strangler was his first lead performance, for which he received rave reviews and was awarded Best Actor from the Knoxville Horror Film Festival.
biography.name: Michael St. Michaels

biography.bio: Thaddeus Golas is an actor, known for Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986), The Video Dead (1987) and Light Blast (1985).
biography.name: Thaddeus Golas

biography.bio: Douglass Bell is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987), Revenge Is Her Middle Name (2011) and Maskhead (2009).
biography.name: Douglass Bell

biography.bio: Al Millan is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: Al Millan

biography.bio: Roxanna Augesen is an actress, known for The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: Roxanna Augesen

biography.bio: Lory-Michael Ringuette is an actor and director, known for Deeply Disturbed (1995), Blood Reaper (2004) and The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: Lory-Michael Ringuette

biography.bio: George Kernan is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: George Kernan

biography.bio: Rocky Duvall is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: Rocky Duvall

biography.bio: Sam David McClelland is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987), The Last of His Tribe (1992) and Midnight Caller (1988).
biography.name: Sam David McClelland

biography.bio: Jennifer Miro was born on May 3, 1957 in Mill Valley, California, USA as Jennifer Anderson. She was an actress and director, known for The Video Dead (1987), Dr. Caligari (1989) and Jungle Assault (1989). She died on December 16, 2011 in New York City, New York, USA.
biography.name: Jennifer Miro

biography.bio: Victoria Bastel was born as Victoria Lynne Bastel. She is an actress, known for Bad Lieutenant (1992), The Dead Pool (1988) and Romeo Is Bleeding (1993).
biography.name: Victoria Bastel

biography.bio: Libby Russler is an actress, known for The Video Dead (1987), The Baby-Sitters Club (1990) and Midnight Caller (1988).
biography.name: Libby Russler

biography.bio: Garrett Dressler is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987).
biography.name: Garrett Dressler

biography.bio: Melissa Martin was born on July 7, 1955 in San Diego, California, USA as Melissa Ann Martin. She was an actress and casting director, known for Death Becomes Her (1992), The Dead Pool (1988) and The Video Dead (1987). She was married to Erich Zander. She died on August 29, 2008 in Maui, Hawaii, USA.
biography.name: Melissa Martin

biography.bio: Cliff Watts is an actor, known for The Video Dead (1987) and Rollercoaster to Hell (1982).
biography.name: Cliff Watts
